```{r}
library(tidyverse)

yarn <- read_csv("~/Desktop/16/CS200B/yarn.csv")
fibers <- read_csv("~/Desktop/16/CS200B/yarn_fibers.csv")

yarn <- yarn |>
  filter(discontinued == "FALSE", yarn_weight_name != "No weight specified") |>
  select(-"permalink", -"yarn_weight_crochet_gauge")

fibers <- fibers |>
  filter(fiber_type_synthetic == "FALSE")
```

```{r}
yarn_fibers <- yarn |>
  left_join(fibers, by = join_by("id"))
```


```{r}
yarn_fibers |>
  count(yarn_company_name)
```
